recommendations.title: Tabular Deep Learning Pretraining
recommendations.description: Proposes target-aware pretraining methods for tabular data, enhancing deep learning models' performance by leveraging unlabeled data, which is shown to beat Gradient Boosting Decision Trees in experiments.

recommendations.title: Deep Abstract Networks
recommendations.description: Innovative neural architectures for tabular data with abstract layers to learn feature interactions, resulting in superior performance on various datasets.

recommendations.title: Universal Tabular Embeddings
recommendations.description: Transforms tabular data into embeddings using a two-step graph auto-encoder approach, allowing for task-independent performance in classification tasks, demonstrated to outperform existing methods.

recommendations.title: DGHNL with Dimensionality Reduction
recommendations.description: Combines optimized data splitting and dimensionality reduction with a deep learning model to improve classification accuracy and AUC in credit scoring tasks.
